annotations: ABDUL YUSUF
adhgzy@r.postjobfree.com 571-***-****
Data engineer with 8+ years of experience on Big Data/Hadoop and 9 years of experience in IT.
Participate in the development/implementation of Cloudera Hadoop and Hortonworks environments.
Capture and transform real-time data into a suitable format for scalable analytics using DStreams.
Send requests to source REST-based API from Scala scripts via Kafka Producer.
Perform importing and exporting of data (SQL Server, CSV, TXT. Parquet, Avro) from local/external file system and RDBMS to S3.
Write shell scripts for automating the process of data loading.
Utilize Spark for data processing and created DStreams from data received from Kafka.
Store results of processed data in Hive.
Automate AWS components like EC2 instances, Security groups, ELB, RDS, Lambda and IAM through AWS Cloud Formation templates.
Work on large data warehouse analysis services servers and developed the different reports for the analysis from those servers.
Write Hive scripts to process HDFS data.
Experience developing Big Data systems with Hadoop and AWS EMR Hadoop clusters.
Technically skilled in HDFS, Spark, Kafka, Hive, Sqoop, HBase, Flume, Oozie, Zookeeper, YARN, etc.
Skilled in Hadoop Big Data using Cloudera (CDH) and Hortonworks (HDP).

Mentor engineers with experience serving communications leadership functions maintaining ongoing communications with project stakeholders, business units, data scientists/analysts and making sure all teams collaborate smoothly.
Skilled extracting and generating data visualizations.
Facilitate meetings following Scrum processes such as Sprint Planning, Backlog, Sprint Retrospective, and Requirements Gathering.
Produce documentation for projects and ensure projects are on track with stakeholder wishes.
In-depth understanding/knowledge of Hadoop Architecture and various components such as HDFS, Job Tracker, Task Tracker, Name Node, Data Node and MapReduce concepts.
Utilize Apache Hadoop for working with Big Data to analyze large data sets efficiently.
Hands-on with Hive's analytical functions and extending Hive core functionality by writing custom SQL queries.
Experience importing and exporting terabytes of data between HDFS and Relational Database Systems using Sqoop.
Hands-on applying Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) processes from databases such as SQL Server and Oracle to Hadoop HDFS in Data Lake.
Experience writing SQL queries, Stored Procedures, Triggers, Cursors and Packages.
Experience handling XML files and related technologies.
Skilled programming in Python, Scala, and Java.
Apply Spark streaming to receive real-time data using Kafka/on prem and AWS cloud.
Use Spark Structured Streaming for high-performance, scalable, fault-tolerant data processing of real-time data streams by extending core Spark API on prem and AWS.
Experience with multiple terabytes of data stored in AWS using Elastic Map Reduce (EMR) and Redshift PostgreSQL.
Experience working Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Cloud Services such as EMR, EC2, S3, EBS and IAM entities, roles, and users.

Hadoop Engineer Select Computing
New York, NY November 2020 - Current
